results.title: Influence of Hyperglycemia on the Prognosis of Patients with Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@Hyperglycemia@@@ and secondary @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ are related to the poor prognosis of @DISEASE_Lymphoma_Large_B_Cell_Diffuse @DISEASE_MESH:D016403 @@@DLBCL@@@ population.For @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Lymphoma_Large_B_Cell_Diffuse @DISEASE_MESH:D016403 @@@DLBCL@@@ combined with @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, the application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can improve survival rate.

results.text_hl: In conclusion, our meta-analysis suggested that combined CHF with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment is promising for the modulation of the gut microbiota along with ameliorating @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
